channel.title: Articles on Duncan Beard's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Duncan Beard's Blog

item.title: New Year, New Site
item.description: I’ve owned duncanbeard.com for years now, and the most use I got out of it was a slick email address. I’ve tried creating a personal site more times than I can count, and the bit that always comes back to bite me is I’m not a UX developer. Making nicely designed things has never been my forte, whether posters in school, attempts at movies, or websites. So, this aversion to freeform design has stymied my efforts to pursue another area of interest for me — writing.
